code: import React from'react';import{logo}from'../svg/logo';var About=function About(){return React.createElement("section",{className:"about",id:"about"},React.createElement("div",{className:"logo"},logo()),React.createElement("h1",null,"Juliette Antoniou"),React.createElement("h3",null,"Software Developer"),React.createElement("p",null,"I've had a passion for learning how things work and creating new ones for as long as I can remember. I fell in love with coding and web development in the early 00's from the moment I created my first Geocities site, but as an adult shifted my focus to working with human brains rather than mechanical ones. I graduated from Rutgers University with a BA in Psychology in 2013, but in 2018 made the decision to refocus on programming. After many late nights coding on my own, and attending Lambda School's full stack web development bootcamp, I have honed my skills and found my passion. Currently, I am a Section Lead at Lambda School, guiding a team of teaching assistants and students through that same full stack bootcamp, but am looking to bring my dedication, drive, and coding skills into a new software development role."));};export default About;
